docs.title: React Developer
docs.intro: React Developer with a background in web3 and blockchain

children.text: We need an experienced developer that is proficient in both JavaScript and React.js. The majority of your time will be spent learning and using standard React.js practices for the development of UI components (such as Flux or Redux). All of these parts, and the program as a whole, will be guaranteed to be dependable and straightforward to keep thanks to your efforts.

You'll work side-by-side with the rest of the team as they tend to the infrastructure's many tiers. Therefore, it is critical to commit to working together to find solutions, to thoughtfully designing the product, and to producing an excellent end result. You'll be working with React.js and Next.js to build and implement UI elements. You'll also be in charge of documenting our front-end codebase, as well as profiling and enhancing its performance.
Send us your resume right now if you're interested.
Requirements
Worked for a minimum of 4 years as React.js engineer or relevant experience
Have at a minimum, a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science/IT/Systems Engineering or other related qualifications.
Possess strong verbal and written interpersonal communication skills
Strong proficiency in the Javascript/Typescript programming language
Strong proficiency in React development and debugging tools
Shipped maintainable production and consumer-facing application
Experience in design patterns and best practices
Familiarity with NextJS or any other static site generator frameworks
Basic understanding of blockchain, good to have some experience with blockchain related technologies like web3 or ethers
Job Description
Meeting with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
Reviewing application requirements and interface designs.
Identifying web-based user interactions.
Developing and implementing highly responsive user interface components using react concepts.
Writing application interface codes using JavaScript following react.js workflows.
Troubleshooting interface software and debugging application codes.
Developing and implementing front-end architecture to support user interface concepts.
Monitoring and improving front-end performance.
Documenting application changes and developing updates.

docs.title: Social Media Manager
docs.intro: Social Media Manager with a background in blockchain and web3

children.text: In order to manage our company's social media presence, we need to hire a skilled social media manager. You will be in charge of producing new written and video material, as well as posting to and engaging with our audience. You will coordinate the presentation of our firm to the public in order to help us reach our marketing goals.

We anticipate that as a social media manager, you will keep abreast of emerging technology and social media trends. You should be able to articulate the company's stance in a way that is both original and compelling.
In the end, you should be able to manage our company's social media profiles and ensure substantial increases in both website visitors and active customers.
Requirements
Around 3-5 years total experience.
Proven work experience as a Social media manager
Hands on experience in content management
Excellent copywriting skills
Ability to deliver creative content (text, image and video)
Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research and Google Analytics
Knowledge of online marketing channels
Experience in a startup culture - comfortable with a fast paced, autonomous, and unstructured environment
Possess strong verbal and written interpersonal English communication skills
Negotiation, communication and well-developed social skills
Prior knowledge of blockchain technology, web 3.0, and/or cybersecurity is highly desirable.
Job Description
Perform research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences
Design and implement social media strategy to align with business goals
Set specific objectives and report on ROI
Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)
Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics
Collaborate with other teams, like marketing, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistency
Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor customer reviews
Oversee social media accountsâ€™ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures and blog layout)
Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applications

docs.title: Project Manager
docs.intro: Technical Project Manager with a background in Front-End Development

children.text: To oversee the product, design, and engineering teams, we need a seasoned Project Manager.

Managing both people and processes, it will be your responsibility as our company's Project Manager to guarantee that all of our projects are completed and delivered on schedule. You will be the one everyone turns to when questions arise about how a project is structured or when it will be completed. Managing projects effectively is a skill you should have in spades. Your duties will include planning, allocating resources, supervising, and documenting the progress of the projects you're responsible for. To ensure the project's scope is being adhered to and that it is proceeding on time, you will be coordinating directly with higher management.

We need a technically proficient project manager to handle the whole project life cycle, from planning to completion. The technical project manager is in charge of sticking to schedules and keeping everyone on track financially. One of the most important qualities for a technical project manager is the ability to stay on top of everything. An effective technical project manager can switch between tasks with ease.
Send us your resume right now if you're a natural leader and manager.
Requirements
Around 3-5 years total experience.
Proven work experience as a Project Manager or similar role
Proficiency in project management software(s)
Highly organized and able to multitask and oversee several projects simultaneously
Strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written
Relevant training and/or certifications as an Assistant Project Manager
Experience in a startup culture - comfortable with a fast paced, autonomous, and unstructured environment
Possess strong verbal and written interpersonal English communication skills
Negotiation, communication and well-developed social skills
Job Description
Create project plans with relevant team members
Supervise team members and ensure that deadlines are followed
Maintain project budgets
Enforce health and safety protocol
Prepare progress reports for senior management
Identify the resources needed for the project and source these materials
Oversee the implementation of project improvements

To ensure the project's scope is being adhered to and that it is proceeding on time, you will be coordinating directly with higher management.

We need a technically proficient project manager to handle the whole project life cycle, from planning to completion. The technical project manager is in charge of sticking to schedules and keeping everyone on track financially. One of the most important qualities for a technical project manager is the ability to stay on top of everything. An effective technical project manager can switch between tasks with ease.

  • Negotiation, communication and well-developed social skills

  • Maintain project budgets
  • Enforce health and safety protocol
  • Prepare progress reports for senior management
  • Identify the resources needed for the project and source these materials
  • Oversee the implementation of project improvements

docs.title: Associate HR Manager
docs.intro: Seeking an Associate Human Resources Manager to Join Our Team!

children.text: To round up our Human Resources department, we are looking for self-starters with a strong work ethic. You'll be accountable for actively supporting the whole people operation, including onboarding, offboarding, paperwork, and recruitment.

You need to be familiar with numerous applicant tracking systems and have extensive knowledge of HR best practices to excel in this role. As an added requirement, you should have strong emotional intelligence and decision-making skills. Being capable of working well alone and in a team setting will serve you well.
If you think you have what it takes to do the job, we'd love to hear from you. We're eager to have a chat with you.
Requirements
Around 3-5 years total experience.
At least 3 years experience in recruitment, HR, or similar departments
Experience in a startup culture - comfortable with a fast paced, autonomous, and unstructured environment
Possess strong verbal and written interpersonal English communication skills
Negotiation, communication and well-developed social skills
Job Description
Manage relationships and communication with different stakeholders, managers and other collaborators
Take the complete ownership of the people operation especially recruitment during the early startup phase
Helping build a strong culture which aligns with our ethos and values
Manage strategic HR projects and process related to employee wellness and wellbeing
Working with the founders and department heads to build a strong culture and help implement innovative team bonding activities
Implement the HR processes, managing the local execution working with the corporate HR department to ensure the consistency of the local policies and processes with the central HR strategy
Help implement innovative tools to bring automation in HR

meta.title: Associate HR Manager Position at Neptune Mutual
meta.description: We seek self-motivated people with a strong work ethic to fill the position of Associate HR Manager.
